H0.text: Electrons, neutrons, and protons are the parts that make up an atom.

H1.text: Electrons, protons, and gamma rays are the parts that make up an atom.

H2.text: Neutrons, photons, and beta particles are the parts that make up an atom.

H3.text: Neutrons, protons, and alpha particles are the parts that make up an atom.

A4.text: An atom consists of a nucleus of protons and generally neutrons, surrounded by an electromagnetically bound swarm of electrons.

A5.text: The constituent particles of an atom are the electron, the proton, and the neutron.
